content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #146

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Event Catalog should be a separate specification.

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Event Catalog
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation: Correction

Summary: Event Catalog should be a separate specification.

Comment: Event Catalog should be a separate specification.

Or even, each event could be a separate specification.

Thus it can mature indepdently.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._
